website_summaries.verdict: A basic model ideal for studying or demonstrations.
pros: Adult sized model comes on quality stainless steel stand
Arms and legs are removable for more detailed study
Includes full-color skeletal poster and dust cover
Bones made from quality PVC material
cons: Not as detailed as some models, but works for basic anatomy

customer_reviews.title: good skeleton model
customer_reviews.text: I bought this skeleton model for my anatomy class. And it arrived in a good condition. When i assembled every part of bones, i found it easy to put all together. It is not very heavy , but still carried some weight. In addition, it is good for decorating on Halloween holidays. And it also came with posters showing the names of every parts. I mean it is definitely an excellent teaching aid for tactile learners like to touch the bones and learn all of the names by heart.
customer_reviews.author: oncidium Littlejohn

customer_reviews.title: Great for Anatomy Exam Prep
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I needed! Great quality and detailed. It definitely helped me get a 99.5% on my lab exam in nursing school.
customer_reviews.author: Carey Kendall

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how real it was, and it was a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: This skeleton worked well for our physicians.
customer_reviews.text: For the price this skeleton work well as a teaching tool for the department of anesthesia.
customer_reviews.author: Todd DeRoo

customer_reviews.title: Product is great as an instructional aid.
customer_reviews.text: I like the quality, sturdiness and anatomical correctness of the model.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Really useful for medical students, the best study material for anatomy!
customer_reviews.author: Eunice Lin

customer_reviews.title: This helped if you are a visual learner
customer_reviews.text: That I can leave class and go home and continue to visually study the bones from home
customer_reviews.author: Karlene Hansel

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, great quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I received it three ago and just got time to open it today! I am so surprised with the picture which have all the bone name on it! I love it! I put it in my massage store, it makes our store look even more professional!😜
customer_reviews.author: Lana, Texas

customer_reviews.title: Basic skeleton
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a basic skeleton this will work. I was using for a honor anatomy course, so it is not as detailed on the bones as I was hoping, but it works for basic anatomy purposes. Also the appendages are only attached with a little piece of metal that hook on both sides, so they fall off almost every time my students move the skeleton. We will end up taking both of them apart and just using them as loose bones.
customer_reviews.author: Linwood Starling

customer_reviews.title: good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for the price. No articulation of the hands/fingers. The legs and arms connect with a wire and may not exactly align with a real skeleton so you might have to work with the metal wire and adjust it. If you want a skeleton with finger articulation instead of just a piece of molded plastic, you will have to spend more. Assembly is rather obvious and I think easy.
customer_reviews.author: G-Man

customer_reviews.title: This is the skeleton for you!
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly, quality construction, attention to detail and anatomic accuracy - that's just a taste of what you get when you buy a skeleton from these folks at RONTEN. These folks will do whatever possible to help out even after the sale. I'd like to go in to the specifics, but Amazon doesn't like reviews about service. All you need to know is that these amazing people will take care of you when you buy this tremendous skeleton.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: My son loves this gift
customer_reviews.text: This anatomical skeleton model is a Halloween gift I bought for my son and, of course, a learning tool for science. Opening the box presents a semi-finished product, which I only need to put the knee joint onto the model. It's so easy for my son to assemble it, and this gift is so cool. He likes it very much. On the whole, I'm satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Salyna Siu

customer_reviews.title: Rich on details
customer_reviews.text: The assembling takes just almost no time and requires no manual. Every single bone is rich on details, from which it can easily show how each joint works, although they are loosely connected. It is quite a useful design to embed steel cycles on each fingertip, which helped a lot on the posing of the set. The only concern is dusting. Considering to use the leaf blower to clean up every period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Floria Tanith

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: This model is so great and I’m so excited to use it for teaching! He’s just the perfect size to be able to explain the bones and fully able to move without falling off or any other issues. I also love the mini poster it came with. So happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Stanley the Skeleton hangs out while we barbecue
customer_reviews.text: Our skeleton’s name is Stanley and he hangs out with us now while we BBQ and he does Inappropriate things to guests sometimes Lol. But yes bought him for A&P and bones was my second best exam coming in at mid 90’s so yes I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Derek C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect desk
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size to put on my desk so I don't have to keep bend over. That really helps out due to a back injury I have. Details are awesome. Makes learning the structure a lot easier. I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy K. Appleby

customer_reviews.title: Anatomically Inaccurate Due to Material
customer_reviews.text: Due to the material used combined with how the parts were packaged, multiple parts were warped to the point that they could not be considered viable references while studying. A few examples: the skull sits too far posteriorly on C1 when screwed in place, every cervical vertebrae was compressed and deformed, and both humerus (humeri?) were curved like clavicles. If you are looking for a skeleton model to use as a reference for accurate anatomical positioning, this is not the skeleton for you.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: Dem bones, Dem bones!!!
customer_reviews.text: This one is a keeper!!! As a healthcare educator, I have, in the past, been VERY disappointed with the content and quality of posters of human anatomy and physiology. NOT THIS TIME!!! This poster is accurate, appropriate color and content and will be easy to find a frame for. LOVE IT and will definitely be using in my classes!!! Great price, fast shipping, good packaging and arrived on time!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Burton

customer_reviews.title: Arrives almost completely assembled
customer_reviews.text: I'm a student of acupuncture and am finding the full size skeleton helpful for studying. It was super easy to set up and of good quality. Even comes with a dust cover. Wheels on stand are on the cheaper side, so they don't roll that easily, but that does not affect the performance of the item for me.
customer_reviews.author: E. Lorde-Rollins, MD, MSc

customer_reviews.title: Great for learning!
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect skeleton for a classroom or learning at home! It comes with a poster for reference. It was pretty easy to put together and the stand has wheels to move around easily!
customer_reviews.author: JoeCanAm

customer_reviews.title: great poster
customer_reviews.text: really great and informative poster. it is just as described!
customer_reviews.author: IceQx13

customer_reviews.title: Nice learning poster
customer_reviews.text: Very detailed pictures. Easy to understand and the pictures are clear and bold.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: No hyoid
customer_reviews.text: They do not label the hyoid or reference where it should be!
customer_reviews.author: Ami

customer_reviews.title: NA
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved and still loving this model for my Anatomy clasa
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Could be bigger.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 11 and 8 year.olds to learn . Very detailed and long with different parts explained separately. Not bad for older kids. Quality looks good and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Phemi Oh Qu Sahmi

customer_reviews.title: I'll call him Mr.Bones lol
customer_reviews.text: What a great learning tool and addition to my many collectibles
customer_reviews.author: Michael J

customer_reviews.title: seems good
customer_reviews.text: From the pictures shown, it seems to be of good quality and well-made. From the description, I can see that its material is very good. All things considered, good model and good price
customer_reviews.author: coumarkubkqtqot

product_meta.title: RONTEN Human Skeleton Model, Anatomical Skeleton lifesize 70.8 in, Including Booth + Cover + Poster
feature_bullets: 【70.8 In Life Size Human Skeleton】The whole adult skeleton model is set in a standing posture on a stand,high quality stainless steel wire and screw connections.
【Disarticulated Human Skeleton For Your Study】Arms and legs are removable for individual study. Also the medical skeleton model’s Skull cap, jaw, shoulder, elbow, wrist, and joints are movable too.

【Convenient For Moving】With an additional stand with casters and stainless steel holder you can easily moving the anatomical skeleton model, easy to clean and it is washable and you just need to wipe off the dust with cloth.

【Perfect Tool For Both Teaching Or Demonstrating】This RONTEN flexible skeleton model can be used in hospitals, offices, schools and universities. An ideal anatomical skeleton model for for all offices of medical professionals, teachers, and students.

【Come With Thoughtful Gift】Includes a free colorful human skeleton chart to show all the detailed structures for reference and a large plastic bag as dust cover to prevent your anatomy skeleton model from being dirty.
